name: 結華
text: （さてと……ほしいものは揃ったし、そろそろ帰るか……）
trans: (Let's see... I've bought everything on my list, so I guess it's time to head home.)

name: 結華
text: ……あれ。あのふたり……
trans: Huh... That's...

name: 恋鐘
text:
……おかしかねー
うちの記憶では確かにこっちなんよ
trans:
...What in tha heck?
I swear I remember it bein' 'round here.

name: 霧子
text: この道……さっきも、通ったかも……
trans: I think we might have... Gone down this road already...

name: 結華
text: やっぱり……
trans: Just as I suspected...

name: 結華
text:
これはこれは、先日の王子様！
今日は可愛いお姫様まで連れちゃって、どしたのー？
trans: Well look who it is! That charming prince I met the other day! I see she has cute princess in tow as well. I wonder why?

name: 恋鐘
text: あ、結華！
trans: Howdy, Yuika!

name: 恋鐘
text:
なんね、結華は王子なうちが気に入ったと？
霧子もおるし、また見せちゃろっか？
trans: Didya like my prince impression that much? Since Kiriko ain't seen it yet, maybe I should do it again!

name: 霧子
text: お、王子様……？
trans: P-Prince impression?

name: 結華
text:
楽しそうだけど、また次の機会にとっておこうかな～
それよりさ、ふたりは揃ってお出かけ？　デート？
trans: That does sound fun, but perhaps it's best saved for a different occasion! Anyway, what are you two doing out together? Is this a date?

name: 恋鐘
text:
そうたい！　今日は霧子とお茶してたとよ！
これから買い物もする予定ばい！
trans: Darn right! Me an' Kiriko had tea together earlier. And now we're gonna do some shoppin'.

name: 霧子
text: う、うん……そうなんだけど……
trans: Y-Yes... So we thought, but...

name: 結華
text:
何かお困りだったり？
さっきもあわあわしてたっぽかったけど
trans: Is something the matter? You did seem a bit confused when I spotted you.

name: 恋鐘
text:
うちらの心配してくれたん？　優しかねぇ
でも問題なかよ！　別に、困っとるってほどじゃなかと
trans: Were ya worried 'bout us? Yer such a sweetheart. But there ain't no issue! Er, not enough of one that I'd say somethin's the matter.

name: 恋鐘
text: ちょっとここがどこなのかわからんだけたい！
trans: We jus' have no darn idea where we are!

name: 結華
text:
なるほどねぇ、こがたんってばポジティブ～！
……ちなみにきりりん、どこ行こうとしてたの？
trans: I see. You always focus on the positive don't you, Kogatan~! ...Kiririn, why don't you start by telling me where you're trying to go?

name: 霧子
text: あ、えっと……本屋さんに、行きたくて……
trans: Ah, um... I wanted to go to a bookstore...

name: 恋鐘
text:
霧子、病院の患者さんたちにおつかい頼まれてたらしか
そん中に普通の本屋じゃ売っとらんものもあって
trans: Kiriko got sent to pick up some books for patients at tha hospital. But summa tha books on her list weren't things they had at the usual bookstore.

name: 恋鐘
text:
やけん、新しいお店ば探しとるところたい！
うちの勘では、もうすぐ着くと思うんやけど～
trans: So we're tryna find another bookstore! Accordin' to my flawless intuition, we should be findin' one right 'bout now, but!

name: 結華
text:
ははぁ、冒険の途中だったってわけですか
だったらその旅、三峰も仲間に入れてよ
trans: A-ha, so you're in the middle of an adventure. Why don't you let Mitsumine accompany you on this journey?

name: 結華
text:
王子と姫と、優秀な道案内
バランスのいいパーティだと思わない？
trans: A prince, a princess, and an excellent tour guide. We make a well-balanced party, don't you think?

name: 恋鐘
text: おおっ、それは心強かね～！
trans: Havin' yer help make me feel so reassured!

name: 霧子
text: ふふ、うん……！
trans: Eheh, yes...!

name: 霧子
text:
本のリストを……預かってて……
結華ちゃん、これでわかるかな……？
trans: This is... the book list they gave me... Do you think you'll be able to find all of these, Yuika-chan...?

name: 結華
text: 見せて見せてー。……ふんふん。おっけー
trans: Let's see here... Hmmm-hmmm. Okay.

name: 結華
text:
何軒か回る必要ありそうだけど、多分揃うと思うよ
あ、古本屋は使っても大丈夫？
trans: It looks we'll need to visit several different stores, but I think we'll be able to find everything. Oh, is it cool if we get some of these books used?

name: 霧子
text:
う、うん……！
ありがとう。結華ちゃん……すごいな……
trans: Y-Yes...! Thank you, Yuika-chan... You're incredible!

name: 恋鐘
text:
うちも何軒でも付き合うけんね！
張りきって探すば～い！
trans:
I'll go along to as many store as it takes!
We jus' gotta keep searchin an' searchin'!

name: 結華
text: ……これで全部かな？
trans: ...Is this all of them?

name: 霧子
text:
揃ったみたい……
ほんとに……ありがとう、結華ちゃん……！
trans: I think it is... Thank you... so very much, Yuika-chan!

name: 恋鐘
text:
すごか～！　どの本もすぐ見つけてしまうけん、
結華は町の司書さんばい！
trans: Yer amazin'! No matter what tha book, ya found it immediately! Yer practically the town librarian!

name: 結華
text: 町の司書さんか、かっこいいねそれ！
trans: The town librarian, huh? Makes me sound pretty cool.

name: 霧子
text:
結華ちゃん、本当に……かっこよかった……！
選んでくれた漫画とか……
trans:
You really were... So cool...!
And all this manga you picked out...

name: 霧子
text:
はやく……渡してあげたい
入院で、不安そうな子がいて……
trans: I can't wait... to bring it to the hospital... There's a child there who seems very anxious, you see...

name: 結華
text:
ほんと？　なら良かった。……まぁ中身はともあれ、
きりりんの優しさには感動しちゃうんじゃないかな？
trans: Is there? I hope they enjoy it... Well, regardless, I'm sure the patients will be very moved by your kindness, Kiririn.

name: 結華
text: 喜んでもらえるといいねぇ
trans: Hopefully they'll be happy, too.

name: 霧子
text: うん……！
trans: Yes...

name: 恋鐘
text:
せっかくやし、霧子は感想聞いてこんといかんね！
それにうちらも読んでみたか！
trans: Since Yuika helped so much, ya gotta make sure to tell her what that kid thinks of tha manga she picked out! I might wanna read it too!

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
待ってて、結華ちゃん……！
trans:
Y-Yes...
Just you wait, Yuika-chan!

name: 結華
text:
や、そんなお構いなく！
もし酷評食らったら三峰のガラスのハートが割れちゃうから
trans: Oh, no need for that! Mitsumine's fragile heart of glass might shatter if she heard that they hated it.

name: 結華
text: ふたりの心の中で止めといて～
trans: Keep what they say between yourselves, please~!

name: 恋鐘
text:
なんをそんなに心配しとると？
結華が選んだの、全部面白そうだったばい！
trans:
Whatcha actin' so worried 'bout?
Everythin' ya picked out looked real good!

name: 霧子
text: う、うん……わたしもそう思う……
trans: Y-Yes... I thought so, too!

name: 結華
text:
──そっか
こがたんときりりんがそう言ってくれるなら充分だよ
trans:
──Really?
If you both say so, then I guess there's no reason to worry.

name: 恋鐘
text:
……あ、ちょうどよか時間ばい
どこかでご飯にするとよ！
trans:
...Hey, it's 'bout dinner time, ain't it?
We should stop somewhere an' eat!

name: 結華
text:
いいね！
優秀な道案内は美味しいご飯屋さんも紹介できるけど……
trans: Absolutely! Your excellent tour guide can think of of several delicious restaurants in this area...

name: 結華
text:
パスタが自慢のお店とデザートのサービスがつくお店、
どっちがいい？
trans: Let's see. There's a restaurant that serves pasta as it's main dish, and a restaurant that has a dessert bar. Which would you prefer?

name: 恋鐘
text:
んんー……！　どっちも悩ましか……！
霧子、任せたばい！　霧子の好きな方でよか！
trans:
Hmmm! Ain't an easy choice!
Kiriko, you decide! Whichever one you like!

name: 霧子
text:
えっ……えっと……
ゆ、結華ちゃんに……おまかせです……！
trans:
Uh... Ummm!
Y-Yuika-chan... I'll let you pick!

name: 結華
text:
あれっ戻ってきた！？
じゃあまぁ、デザートの方にしよっか！
trans: Throwing it back to me, are we? Alright then, let's go to the one with the dessert bar!

name: 結華
text: ──それでは！　突発女子会、スタート～！
trans: ─Well then! Our unexpected Girl's Night Out begins, NOW~!

name: 恋鐘
text: おーっ！
trans: Wahoo!

name: 霧子
text: お、おーっ……！
trans: W-Wahoo...!
